Class PhotoStorage

java.lang.Object
Model.PhotoStorage
public class PhotoStorage extends Object
PhotoStorage class - Manages storage and operations on photo collections. Provides functionality to add, remove, rename, and sort photos.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    PhotoStorage.Photo
    Inner Photo class - Represents a simple photo with title and path.

    Constructs an empty PhotoStorage.

    Method
    Description

    Adds a new photo to storage by title and path.

    Adds a Photo object at a specific index.

    Gets the list of all photos in storage.

    Removes a photo at the specified index.
    void
    renamePhoto(int index, String newTitle)
    Renames a photo at the specified index.
    void
    sortByName()
    Sorts the photo collection by title in case-insensitive alphabetical order.

  • Constructor Details

    • PhotoStorage

      public PhotoStorage()
      Constructs an empty PhotoStorage.

  • Method Details

    • addPhoto

      public void addPhoto(String title, String path)
      Adds a new photo to storage by title and path. Creates a Photo object and adds it to the collection.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the photo
      path - The file path to the photo

    • removePhoto

      public void removePhoto(int index)
      Removes a photo at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the photo to remove (0-based)

    • renamePhoto

      public void renamePhoto(int index, String newTitle)
      Renames a photo at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the photo to rename (0-based)
      newTitle - The new title for the photo

    • addPhotoAt

      public void addPhotoAt(int index, PhotoStorage.Photo photo)
      Adds a Photo object at a specific index.
      Parameters:
      index - The position to insert the photo (0-based)
      photo - The Photo object to add

    • getPhotos

      public ArrayList<PhotoStorage.Photo> getPhotos()
      Gets the list of all photos in storage.
      Returns:
      ArrayList containing all Photo objects

    • sortByName

      public void sortByName()
      Sorts the photo collection by title in case-insensitive alphabetical order.
